problem_names:
lemma data_dependence_def: "n influences V in n' = 
  (\<exists>a' as'. (V \<in> Def n) \<and> (V \<in> Use n') \<and>
                 (n -a'#as'\<rightarrow>* n') \<and> (\<forall>n'' \<in> set (sourcenodes as'). V \<notin> Def n''))"
translations:
lemma data_dependence_def: "n influences V in n' = 
  (\<exists>a' as'. (V \<in> Def n) \<and> (V \<in> Use n') \<and>
                 (n -a'#as'\<rightarrow>* n') \<and> (\<forall>n'' \<in> set (sourcenodes as'). V \<notin> Def n''))"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. n influences V in n' =
    (\<exists>a' as'.
        V \<in> Def n \<and>
        V \<in> Use n' \<and>
        n -a' # as'\<rightarrow>* n' \<and>
        (\<forall>n''\<in>set (sourcenodes as'). V \<notin> Def n''))
